argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitmulcl.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitgrp.2 | |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |
| 3 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_unitgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. CRing -> G e. Grp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_crngmgp | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( mulGrp ` R ) e. CMnd ) |
| 8 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. CRing -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 10 | 2 | #P_subcmn | |- ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) e. CMnd /\ G e. Mnd ) -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 11 | 7, 9, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( R e. CRing -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 12 |  | #P_isabl | |- ( G e. Abel <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. CMnd ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 11, 12 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. CRing -> G e. Abel ) |
